All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Deadline
    Deadlines: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time e.g., submit report by 11/10/2019 5pm
    Duke
    the class containing the main function to run the programme
    DukeException
    throws exception specifically to duke
    Event
    Events: tasks that start at a specific time and ends at a specific time e.g., team project meeting on 2/10/2019 2-4pm
    Parser
    deals with making sense of the user command
    Storage
    deals with loading tasks from the file and saving tasks in the file
    Task
    The class that all the tasks inherit from
    TaskList
    contains the task list
    ToDo
    ToDos: tasks without any date/time attached to it e.g., visit new theme park
    Ui
    deals with interactions with the user
